attributes.action: operate the same terms and conditions for staff of public owned banks - no bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No bonuses to be paid to staff of any bank or financial institution that has received tax payer money. Those who we own a majority stake need to have all their terms and conditions changed to the same as public sector staff.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
